Articles.Content:
Hey all, just discovered KSP a week or so ago via the demo and have now bought the full game, loving every minute of it but obviously still have lots to learn (though pebblegarden's videos have helped immensely with the basics). So far have a couple of sats in orbit and am about to start flinging Kerbals up there....and if they're lucky bring them back down again!

See you all around the forum!
